accessAssets(address,uint256,address,byt.details: CRITICAL: Main function for cross-protocol access without withdrawal

params.amount: The amount to access from shared pool
params.token: The token address to access (should be this contract for native access)
params.user: The user whose assets are being accessed

authorizeProtocol(address,bool).details: Authorize a protocol to access shared pool assets

canAccessAssets(address,address,uint256).details: Check if a protocol can access user's assets

depositToSharedPool(uint256).details: Deposit tokens to shared pool for cross-protocol access

params.amount: Amount to deposit to shared pool

getTotalAccessibleBalance(address).details: Get user's total accessible balance (regular + shared pool)

returnAssets(address,uint256).details: Return assets back to shared pool after protocol usage

params.user: The user to return assets to

withdrawFromSharedPool(uint256).details: Withdraw tokens from shared pool back to regular balance

params.amount: Amount to withdraw from shared pool
